Hellfire Blade.name: Hellfire Blade
Hellfire Blade.flavor: Your blade blazes with an infernal fire, turning all it touches into black ash.
Hellfire Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hellfire Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier fire damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. This damage ignores all resistances.

Ashen Compact.name: Ashen Compact
Ashen Compact.flavor: You utter a demand to infernal agents, and they respond with a boon, draining some of your life essence in payment.
Ashen Compact.effect: Lose 1 healing surge. You teleport 10 squares and gain resist fire equal to your healing surge value until the end of the encounter.

Demon-Fueled Vengeance.name: Demon-Fueled Vengeance
Demon-Fueled Vengeance.flavor: Your blade smolders with a dull red glow, dripping ash as you strike at your target.
Demon-Fueled Vengeance.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Demon-Fueled Vengeance.effect: All the targetâ€™s resistances are reduced to 0 (save ends).
